price: លើកលែងតែអ៊ីព្លីសប៉ុណ្ណោះដែលបានបដិសេធក្នុងការ ចូលរួមជាមួយបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលស៊ូជូត។
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa abā an yakūna maʿa al-sājidīna
